author: carstenheidemann
body:
Changes:
1) to the unpacker itself:
added the unpacking of the new ZS data format in L1TTwinMuxRawToDigi.cc
The unpacker decide based on the firmware revision stored in header of the incoming date which type of data it hast to unpack.
Both types of data (old (non ZS) and new (ZS)) can be unpacked.
All old data fields are filled in both cases.
In case of ZS data additional the new UpDownTag is saved.
The new UpDownTag is encoded into the existing ts2tagCode.
The code is prepared to include a (future) differentiation between the first and second track for ZS data.

2) DataFormats
The data structure itself has not been touched.
The Ts2Tag() function was modified to return the same values (0 or 1) as before, regardless of ZS/nonZS data.
The new UpDownTag() function was implemented. For ZS data it will return 0 or 1. For old data it will always return 0.
title: Unpacker for zero supressed (ZS) data from TwinMux
